item.title: Trump tariffs on China now total 145%, White House clarifies: Live updates
item.description: President Donald Trump's 125% tariffs on China and Beijing's response are reshaping global trade deals and regional alliances in real time.

item.title: Trump tariffs: 'Do not retaliate and you will be rewarded,' White House says
item.description: President Donald Trump's tariffs on nearly all U.S. trade partners will drop to 10% for 90 days, but tariffs on China will jump to 125%.

item.title: Ray Dalio says Trump should negotiate a 'win-win' trade deal with China
item.description: The Bridgewater founder also advised investors to rethink their risk appetite after U.S. tariffs policies sparked wild swings in financial markets.

item.title: Trump temporarily drops tariffs to 10% for most countries, hits China harder with 125%
item.description: The U.S. stock market, which had suffered since President Trump unveiled his tariff plan, rose sharply after he announced a pause to allow negotiation...

item.title: Judge says White House can't ban Associated Press from Oval Office, Air Force One
item.description: Associated Press journalists were blocked from covering Trump events after the AP chose not to use his name change of the Gulf of Mexico to the Gulf o...
